Roles.Name: Administrator
Roles.Description: A system role that grants all permissions to the assigned users.

Roles.Name: Moderator
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to moderate content.

Roles.Name: Editor
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to edit existing content.

Roles.Name: Author
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to create content.

Roles.Name: Contributor
Roles.Description: Grants users the ability to contribute content.

Roles.Name: Authenticated
Roles.Description: A system role representing all authenticated users.

Roles.Name: Anonymous
Roles.Description: A system role representing all non-authenticated users.

ContentTypePartSettings.Description: Provides a collection behavior for your content item.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item.
Provides a collection behavior for your content item.

TextFieldSettings.Hint: The icon css class from font-awesome. e.g., fa-laptop, fa-shopping-cart, fa-lock
The category that is displayed below the title
A description of the image used as title or alternate text

Layers.Name: Always
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are displayed on any page of this site.

Layers.Name: Homepage
Layers.Description: The widgets in this layer are only displayed on the homepage.
